Dear Pauline,

Hope all is well.

We need the following details:

*	
	Incident report - details of how the loss happened
*	
	Supplier's invoice to validate the cost price
*	
	Police report
*	
	Photos/CCTV footage, anything that is available.

I will intimate the claim to the insurer in the meantime.

Best Regards,
Hagop

________________________________

Hello Hagop,

Hope you are doing well.

A Christofle piece (https://www.christofle.com/eu_fr/ours-petit-modele-en-argent-massif-haute-orfevrerie-b03571112.html, price: 9,000€) was stolen last Friday in our store located rue Saint-Honoré.

Could you please let us know what you need to report this damage to our insurer for compensation.

Best regards,

Pauline
